text: Enave, (napiye! Nervaliyin pakkam avarkalai) nir alaittuk konte iruppiraka melum, nir evappatta pirakaram urutiyutan nirpiraka! Avarkalutaiya (ilivana) mano iccaikalai nir pinparratir; innum, "allah irakki vaitta vetankalai nan nampukiren; anriyum unkalitaiye niti valankumpatiyum nan evappattullen. Allahve enkal iraivanavan; avane unkalutaiya iraivanum avan. Enkal ceyalkal enkalukku unkal ceyalkal unkalukku enkalukkum unkalukkumitaiye tarkkam ventam - allah nam'mitaiye (marumaiyil) onru cerppan, avan pale nam mintu cella ventiyirukkiratu" enrum kuruviraka
